title: Online laboratory results consultation system
description: Made with Php and using all web development elements, such as HTML, JavaScript, Css, and Bootstrap. Fed from a local database service, migrating and encrypting data to a new database for later consultation in the web application.

title: Transformers - Finetunning Beto
description: This project was developed as part of the Iberlef Homomex 2024 competition, Track 1. The main objective was to fine-tune a version of Beto to classify tweets in Mexican Spanish, performing a specific fine-tuning for this task.
